item.description:
üîó Connect #

Thank you for visiting my portfolio. I‚Äôm always open to connecting with data scientists, healthcare professionals, researchers, and organizations working at the intersection of healthcare, analytics, and applied AI.

Whether you‚Äôre interested in collaboration opportunities, discussing healthcare data science or analytics roles, or exchanging ideas around clinical analytics, population health, predictive modeling, or AI-driven healthcare solutions, I‚Äôd be glad to connect.

üì¨ Contact Me #

  • üìß Email: sadasivamharishkumar@gmail.com
  • üìû Phone: +1 (972) 654-0333

üåê Professional Profiles #

  • üíº LinkedIn

Feel free to reach out via LinkedIn or email. I‚Äôm always happy to discuss healthcare data science, clinical analytics, health informatics, predictive modeling, or innovative ideas focused on improving patient outcomes and healthcare systems.

üíº Experience #

Data Scientist / Data Analyst #

Community Dreams Foundation ‚Äî Aug 2025 ‚Äì Present

At Community Dreams Foundation, I work as a Data Scientist supporting nonprofit and community health initiatives, applying advanced analytics to evaluate program effectiveness, optimize resource allocation, and support evidence-based decision-making for underserved populations.

My role focuses on building scalable analytics pipelines, transforming operational and demographic data into actionable insights, and communicating results to program leaders and stakeholders.

üìä Projects #

üè• Enhancing Healthcare Delivery Through Advanced EMR Integration #

Role: Healthcare Data Scientist / Full-Stack Analytics Developer
Technologies: MySQL, Node.js, React.js, Express.js, HTML, CSS, ICD-11

  • Designed and developed a full-stack Electronic Medical Records (EMR) platform with a strong focus on analytics-ready clinical data capture and downstream decision support.
  • Built normalized relational databases in MySQL and engineered structured schemas to support patient registration, pathology records, medication history, and longitudinal analysis.
  • Developed interactive front-end workflows using React.js and Node.js, enabling real-time data entry, search, updates, and cohort-style patient retrieval.
  • Implemented ICD-11‚Äìaligned clinical documentation, improving standardization, interoperability, and readiness for analytics and reporting.
  • Optimized internal search logic and query performance, significantly improving data retrieval accuracy and system responsiveness.
  • Diagnosed and resolved backend system issues (plugin errors, authentication compatibility, PID file failures), improving platform stability, reliability, and usability.
  • Laid the foundation for AI-enabled modules by structuring clean, high-quality clinical datasets suitable for future predictive modeling and population health analytics.

Data Science Focus:

item.title: About
item.description:
Hi, I‚Äôm Dr. Harish Kumar Sadasivam (PharmD, MS in Health Informatics) - a Healthcare Data Scientist üß†üìä with a strong clinical foundation and hands-on experience designing data-driven solutions across clinical, research, nonprofit, and operational healthcare domains üè•.

I work at the intersection of clinical expertise, data science, and healthcare systems, transforming complex healthcare data into predictive insights, scalable analytics pipelines, and decision-support tools that improve patient outcomes, operational efficiency, and data-informed decision-making.

üë®‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è Professional Summary

Healthcare Data Scientist with a Master‚Äôs degree in Health Informatics (Indiana University) and a Doctor of Pharmacy (Pharm.D) background. Experienced in designing analytics-ready clinical systems, building end-to-end data pipelines, and applying statistical and predictive methods to real-world healthcare and population health problems.

Strong expertise in SQL, Python, Power BI, and healthcare data standards (ICD-11, HL7, FHIR), with hands-on experience across EMR systems, claims data, population health analytics, and nonprofit community health initiatives.
